Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Maven build failed
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

Documentation is now generated using a maven docbook plugin.  You need to add 
it to your maven install.  It in turn depends on a sun jar that you will 
independently have to add to your local repository (Maven can not autodownload 
it because of the sun license).  See here in the developer doc Chris: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/developer_manual.html#N1003C

Yours,
St.Ack



Quoting jirleech <jirleech@...>:
